EmailTemplate.subject: Big Data Options Abound – What’s Your Next Move?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We know you're likely considering all the options available for getting value from your data. To that end, we'd like to share additional information about Pivotal Big Data Suite – the most advanced, flexible Big Data analytic platform available by subscription – that allows you to store, accelerate processing and operationalize data for business impact within a single system.
Please check out how customers are using products in Pivotal Big Data Suite, as well as other information:
- Watch this video about Qrious <http://www.pivotal.io/>, a media company using Pivotal Big Data products to unlock new business opportunities - View this webcast on Aridhia <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/hadoop/customer-case-study/pivotal-hadoop-and-aridhia-revolutionize-healthcare>, a Pivotal customer that created a healthcare data safe haven - Read our press release <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite-gets-real-time-boost-with-in-memory-upgrade> with the latest news on Pivotal Big Data Suite
You also can find product specifics on the Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data> page. If you’d like more information, please contact us <http://www.pivotal.io/contact>.
The Pivotal Team
